story_teamaquamagma_01_08000/2401_1001_0: Team Magma and Team Aqua are facing off!

But...it’s weird. They don’t look like
they’re fighting.
Looks like the ruckus has calmed down for now.

I must ask you two, what in the world 
happened here?
Maxie’s Groudon attacked us, so I just retaliated.

Your Kyogre attacked us, so we merely returned
the favor.
story_teamaquamagma_01_08000/2401_1001_1:
Sounds like you both have opposite views of
what happened.

What troubles me more is that we can’t find
Groudon or Kyogre.

Rayquaza intervened in their squabble and sent
both of them away.

It didn’t look like either of them started it. They just
both lost it all of a sudden.

Groudon and Kyogre were both behaving
abnormally.

It was like they couldn’t control their own power,
and that’s what set them off.
story_teamaquamagma_01_08000/2401_1001_2:
Two Pokémon who have gone out of control have
disappeared... What a troublesome situation.

Maybe we’re just not capable of properly handling
the powers of super-ancient Pokémon after all.

You’re right... They are entities far beyond the
capacity of mere humans to control.

At the time, it seemed like Kyogre couldn’t even
hear me.

Yeah. If we stay together with them, the same
thing might happen again.

The two of you have been friends with
Groudon and Kyogre so far...

We can definitely become friends with
any Pokémon!
story_teamaquamagma_01_08000/2401_1001_3:
So there’s no way our feelings would fail to get
through to them!

Exactly! There has to be another reason why they
lost control!

Don’t give up on the potential of people and
Pokémon so easily!
We’ll search for Groudon and Kyogre, too!
So don’t give up yet, you two!
The potential of people and Pokémon...

It might be worth trusting what Brendan and the
others are saying this time.

Until we figure out why they went out of control,
we should hold off on securing them.
story_teamaquamagma_01_08000/2401_1001_4:
If their Trainers didn’t instruct them to do it, then
we must figure out what the reason was.

Before you go, would you like to hear a special
hint from yours truly?
